content: Tees are a type of shirt that have a T-shaped design with short sleeves and a round neckline. They are typically made of a lightweight, breathable fabric such as cotton, and are often worn as a casual, everyday garment. Tees are a popular choice for both men and women and are often used as a base layer for layering under other clothing or as a standalone shirt. They can be worn for a variety of occasions, including for exercise, as part of a uniform, or as a casual, everyday shirt.
